attributes.action: guarantee that he will step down if it is found that the UK red lines have been given up in the EU treaty/constitution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THe government keeps on going on that the UK has kept its red lines on the EU treaty/cpnstitution. However, is the government willing to risk his job by giving a guarentee that he will step down if these red lines have been given up.
